info.title: Restarters API
info.description: An API for accessing Restarters data.  No API authorisation is necessary - all data is read-only and public.

get.description: Returns the list of events for a group.

parameters.name: start
parameters.description: The minimum start date for an event in ISO8601 format.  Inclusive.

parameters.name: end
parameters.description: The maximum end date for an event in ISO8601 format.  Inclusive.

get.description: Returns list of networks on the platform.
Returns list of groups for a network.

parameters.name: includeNextEvent
parameters.description: Include the next event for the group.  This makes the call slower.  Default false.

parameters.name: includeDetails
parameters.description: Include the details for each group.  This makes the call significantly slower.  Default false.

get.description: Returns list of events for a network.

parameters.name: updated_start
parameters.description: The minimum start date for an event in ISO8601 format.  Inclusive.

parameters.name: updated_end
parameters.description: The maximum end date for an event in ISO8601 format.  Inclusive.

parameters.name: includeDetails
parameters.description: Include the details for each event.  This makes the call significantly slower.  Default false.

Group.title: Group
Group.description: A Group of Restarters, who organise events.

image.title: image
image.description: URL of an image for this group.  You should prefix this with /uploads before use.

phone.title: phone
phone.description: An optional phone number to contact the group.

website.title: website
website.description: An URL for the group's own separate website.

hosts.title: hosts
hosts.description: The number of hosts of this group.

restarters.title: hosts
restarters.description: The number of restarters in this group.

stats.title: stats
stats.description: An array of statistics about the activity of a group.

co2_powered.title: co2_powered
co2_powered.description: The amount of CO2 saved by repairing powered items.

co2_unpowered.title: co2_unpowered
co2_unpowered.description: The amount of CO2 saved by repairing unpowered items.

waste_powered.title: waste_powered
waste_powered.description: The weight in kg of waste saved by repairing powered items.

waste_unpowered.title: waste_unpowered
waste_unpowered.description: The weight in kg of waste saved by repairing unpowered items.

fixed_powered.title: fixed_powered
fixed_powered.description: The number of powered items which have been repaired.

fixed_unpowered.title: fixed_unpowered
fixed_unpowered.description: The number of unpowered items which have been repaired.

repairable_devices.title: repairable_devices
repairable_devices.description: The number of devices which were capable of being repaired.

dead_devices.title: dead_devices
dead_devices.description: The number of devices which were not capable of being repaired.

unknown_repair_status.title: unknown_repair_status
unknown_repair_status.description: The number of devices where the repair status was not known.

devices_powered.title: devices_powered
devices_powered.description: The number of powered devices seen.

devices_unpowered.title: devices_unpowered
devices_unpowered.description: The number of unpowered devices seen.

no_weight_powered.title: no_weight_powered
no_weight_powered.description: The number of powered devices where no weight was provided.

no_weight_unpowered.title: no_weight_unpowered
no_weight_unpowered.description: The number of unpowered devices where no weight was provided.

participants.title: participants
participants.description: The number of people who attended.

hours_volunteered.title: hours_volunteered
hours_volunteered.description: The estimated number of hours volunteered for this group.

events.title: events
events.description: The number of events created by this group.

updated_at.title: updated_at
updated_at.description: The last change to this group.  This includes changes which affect the stats.

GroupLocation.title: GroupLocation
GroupLocation.description: The information about the location of a group.

area.description: The free-form area that this group is in.

location.description: The location that this group is in.  Must be geocodable.

GroupSummary.title: GroupSummary
GroupSummary.description: The very basic information about a group.  For full information, fetch the group.

image.title: image
image.description: URL of an image for this group.  You should prefix this with /uploads before use.

updated_at.title: updated_at
updated_at.description: The last change to this group.  This includes changes which affect the stats.

Network.title: Network
Network.description: A network of Groups using the Restarters platform.

logo.title: image
logo.description: URL of a logo for this network.  You should prefix this with /uploads before use.

website.title: website
website.description: An URL for the networks's own separate website.

shortname.title: shortname
shortname.description: A short name for the network..

default_language.title: default_language
default_language.description: The default language for users in this network.

stats.title: stats
stats.description: An array of statistics about the activity of a network.

hours_volunteered.title: hours_volunteered
hours_volunteered.description: The estimated number of hours volunteered for this network.

NetworkSummary.title: NetworkSummary
NetworkSummary.description: The summary information about a network.  For the full information, fetch the network.

logo.title: image
logo.description: URL of a logo for this network.  You should prefix this with /uploads before use.

Event.title: Event
Event.description: The full information about an event.

start.title: start
start.description: Start time of the event in ISO8601 format.

end.title: end
end.description: End time of the event in ISO8601 format

timezone.title: timezone
timezone.description: Timezone in which the event is taking place.

description.title: description
description.description: A description of the event.  May contain HTML
description.example: Come along and we'll fix your broken electrical items.

lat.title: lat
lat.description: Latitude at which the event is taking place.  Only valid if online=false.

lng.title: lng
lng.description: Longitude at which the event is taking place.  Only valid if online=false.

start.title: start
